channel.title: cilium on My learning and diary
channel.description: Recent content in cilium on My learning and diary

item.title: Setup kind cluster using cilium cni in wsl2
item.description: Prologue One or two years ago, I tried several times to install kind cluster to using cilium cni. However I didn’t make it. Today I really want to setup one after reading an Kind cluster with Cilium and no kube-proxy and considering that major kubernetes distributions are using cilium cni now. After about 3 hours, I finally got it running successfully. Things don’t go smoothly. Here are my steps to setup it up.
